problemStatement.plain: Hamilton spent 15 years (1828-1843) trying to extend complex numbers to three dimensions. He wanted "triplets" that would do for 3D geometry what complex numbers do for 2D. He finally realized he needed FOUR dimensions (quaternions), not three.
